results.title: Screwdrivers at Lowes.com
results.snippet: Prices, Promotions, styles, and availability may vary. Our local stores do not honor online pricing. Prices and availability of products and services are subject to change without notice. Errors will be corrected where discovered, and Lowe's reserves the right to revoke any stated offer and to correct any errors, inaccuracies or omissions including after an order has been submitted.

results.title: Lowe's has probably the cheapest and comprehensive ...
results.snippet: And again, I reiterate that I have never successfully warrantied a Craftsman tool at Lowes despite trying with three different tools the past few years. I go into HF once, and I grab the replacement tool off the shelf. That's it. But I appreciate the insider tip. I will try that with my Craftsman torx screwdrivers at some point.

results.title: Craftsman V-Series PRO Tool Deals at Lowe's ...
results.snippet: 01. Feels like a blowout or liquidating the unsold stock. The pricing is insanely low for such a good quality tool. The V line is underated, under-advertised, unavailable and price to high. So the sales havenâ€™t been what Stanley B&D hoped.
